LanguageData.TableCGear.label: TC Weapons Bench
LanguageData.TableCGear.description: A workbench equipped with all the tools required to make Tactical Charged (TC) Gear.
LanguageData.CGearChipStand.label: TC Chip Fabrication
LanguageData.CGearChipStand.description: A stand equipped with all the tools required to make Tactical Charged (TC) Chips.
LanguageData.TCToolCabinet.label: TC Tool Cabinet
LanguageData.TCToolCabinet.description: Advanced tool box with power tools that improves work speed when placed near a workbench.
